title: The.Wolf.Among.Us.Episode.4-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:


                      The Wolf Among Us : Episode 4

  Release Date :  4/2014                         Protection : Steam
  Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action


From the makers of the 2012 Game of the Year: The Walking Dead, comes
a gritty, violent and mature thriller based on the award-winning
Fables comic books (DC Comics/Vertigo).


 - Extract
 - Burn or mount the .iso
 - Run setup and install the Game
 - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
 - Play


 Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
 online ..


                     CODEX is currently looking for:

                        nothing but competition!

                            are you ready?

     LNK^CPS                                                02/2014
